      Constructors in fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models with parameters of type SimulatorI 
      Constructor and Description
      Model(java.lang.String uri, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit simulatedTimeUnit, SimulatorI simulationEngine)
      create a model instance with the given URI (if null, one will be generated) and to be run by the given simulator (or by the one of an ancestor coupled model if null) using the given time unit for its clock.

    • Uses of SimulatorI in fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators

      Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators that implement SimulatorI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AtomicEngine
      The class AtomicEngine implements the DEVS simulation protocol to run simulation models that are either atomic or coupled models which submodels all share this atomic engine (i.e., the same simulation algorithm).
      class  AtomicRTEngine
      The class AtomicRTEngine implements a simulation engine which performs simulation in real time aka. the simulation clock follows the real physical time, eventually accelerated (or decelerated).
      class  CoordinationEngine
      The class CoordinationEngine defines the basic behaviours of a DEVS coordinator declared by the interface CoordinationI.
      class  CoordinationRTEngine
      The class CoordinationRTEngine implements a real coordination engine.
      class  SimulationEngine
      The class SimulationEngine defines the basic behaviour of a DEVS simulator declared by the interface SimulatorI.
      Fields in fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators declared as SimulatorI 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected SimulatorI[] CoordinationEngine.coordinatedEngines
      Simulation engines coordinated by this coordination engine.
      Methods in fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators with parameters of type SimulatorI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CoordinationEngine.setCoordinatedEngines(SimulatorI[] coordinatedEngines) 

    • Uses of SimulatorI in fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.interfaces

      Subinterfaces of SimulatorI in fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.interfaces 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AtomicSimulatorI
      The class AtomicSimulatorI Description Black-box Invariants invariant true // no more invariant Created on : 2023-06-08
      interface  CoordinatorI
      The interface CoordinationI defines the core behaviour of DEVS coordination engines, extending the basic behaviour shared by all simulation engines.
      interface  RTAtomicSimulatorI
      The class RTAtomicSimulatorI defines the core behaviour of atomic simulation engines that execute models using the physical clock (of the underlying computer) as simulation clock, or a linear transformation of it (to simulate either faster or slower than the real physical time).
      interface  RTSimulatorI
      The interface RTSimulationI defines the core behaviour of simulation engines that execute models using the physical clock (of the underlying computer) as simulation clock, or a linear transformation of it (to simulate either faster or slower than the real physical time).
      Methods in fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.interfaces with parameters of type SimulatorI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean SimulatorI.blackBoxInvariants(SimulatorI instance)
      return true if the black-box invariants are observed, false otherwise.
      void CoordinatorI.setCoordinatedEngines(SimulatorI[] coordinatedEngines)
      set the simulation engines that are coordinated by this coordination engine.
